Name: Jintsū
Fate:
sunk 13 July 1943

Propulsion:
4 shaft Parsons geared turbines
10 Kampon boilers
90,000 shp (67,000 kW)
Range: 5,000 nautical miles (9,300 km) at 14 knots (26 km/h)
Armament:

7 × 14 cm/50 3rd Year Type naval guns
2 × 8 cm/40 3rd Year Type naval gun s
8 × 610 mm (24 in) torpedo tubes  (4x2)
48 naval mines
(Final)7 × 14 cm/50 3rd Year Type naval guns
2 × triple, 2x twin Type 96 25 mm AA guns
2 × Type 93 13.2 mm machine guns
8 × 610 mm (24 in) torpedo tubes  (4x2)
Armor:

Deck: 20 mm (0.79 in)
